Class Database

java.lang.Object
cashier.Database
public class Database extends Object
Creates a connection to the team_phoenix database.

Hosts methods to run queries in the database without the user needing to know or use SQL commands.

      public int canBeMade(int menu_id)
      Checks if a menu item is capable of being made. (i.e., ingredients are in-stock and not removed)
      Parameters:
      menu_id - The item to be checked.
      Returns:
      An int to represent a boolean. (1=true, 0=false, -1=error)

    • checkManagerPIN

      public int checkManagerPIN(int employee_id, String pin)
      Checks the database to see if a manager's PIN is valid.
      Parameters:
      employee_id - The manager's emloyee id.
      pin - The manager PIN.
      Returns:
      An int value representing the valitity of a manager's PIN. (0=non-manager id, 1=valid id invalid input: '&' pin, 2=invalid pin, -1=error)

    • getSalesPerHour

      public Map<String,Double> getSalesPerHour()
      X-REPORT: Gives sales per hour for the currrent day of operation. Can be run anytime.
      Returns:
      A Map of the time to the total sales in that hour.

    • getTotalSales

      public double getTotalSales()
      Z-REPORT: Get total sales for the current day. Run once at end of day.
      Returns:
      The total sales from the current day.
